title: Broke Bastards, Jennifer Hudson Interview, Carla's Reality Update, Airline Duct Tape and more.
itunes:title: Broke Bastards, Jennifer Hudson Interview, Carla's Reality Update, Airline Duct Tape and more.
description:
Good morning and welcome to the ride! Wake up everybody!!! Bitterman warns a woman about the signs of brokeness. The Princess of Soul stopped by to talk about the Queen. Junior is left scratching his head when someone took a deal from Boston and rejected a sweet one from LA. Real Housewives of Potomac got a new cast member and Carla tells us about it inside Reality Update. "Get The Duct Tape!" Today the show wraps up with a bitter question.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
